thread.title: Report: Bush 41 Sung His Way To Health During Last Hours Of Recent Hospital Stay
thread.title_full: Report: Bush 41 Sung His Way To Health During Last Hours Of Recent Hospital Stay

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Report: Bush 41 Sung His Way To Health During Last Hours Of Recent Hospital Stay
text:
There were a lot of great moments from Sunday’s Super Bowl that had nothing to do with the actual game. 
The game was incredibly exciting but a lot of people were talking about   Bush’s appearance before the game even got underway. He showed up for the coin toss and let’s just say it was pretty awesome. 
Bush 41 is an American hero by every metric. The guy has a resume that just can’t be matched. 
He has also had some pretty serious health problems and the fact he was able to make it to the game was really impressive. 
A recent report shed some light on Bush 41’s frame of mind when he was discharged from the hospital and apparently he was singing himself back to health during the last few hours of his hospital stay. 
From Washington Examiner : 
His spokesman told Secrets that as Bush recovered last week, he had a different attending doctor, internist Dr. Amy Mynderse. Her name stuck in Bush’s mind. 
And on the day he felt good enough to leave, Jan. 30, when she came for a final visit, the president began serenading her with Frank Sinatra’s “Once in Love with Amy.” 
Love it. 
Bush 41 is a class act no matter how you slice it. 
Guess what a lot of liberals did during the Super Bowl? 
Mercilessly mocked the former president for being so frail. 
Liberals are great aren’t they? LIKE this article?
